title: Galio as Jungle.

replies.body: Galio is usually a Mid/Top/Support champion, so idk why he was filtered as a jgler. Regardless you would most likely go the tank jg item, or the ap one if you want to try ap galio. If you've played League long enough it should be easy to figure out what each champion needs to build.
I know Galio's usual roles, I have level 7 on him :) I also knew what to build, I jsut found it funny that they put him in the jungle category but don't recommend a jungle item
I don't see Galio being suited as a jungler.
Neither do I lol, I just tried it because he was filtered in haha
